# Intimidating Prowess (Feat)
## Overview
Your physical might is intimidating to others.

**Benefit**: Add your Strength modifier to [[Intimidate (Skill)|Intimidate]] skill checks in addition to your Charisma modifier.

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 128
